# I. Health application: diagnostis of a heart attack
```{r}
tab <- read.table(file="./SAheart.txt", header = TRUE, sep = ",", row.names = 1)
names(tab)
```

```{r}
dim(tab) #dimension of data set
```

```{r}
head(tab)
```

```{r}
tab$famhist <- as.numeric(tab$famhist == "Present")
head(tab)
```

```{r}
plot(tab, pch=20, col=rgb(0, 1, 0.5))
```

```{r}
pairs(tab[,-5],pch=22,bg=c("red","blue")[unclass(factor(tab[,"chd"]))])
```

```{r}
plot(tab$chd~tab$obesity,xlim=c(15,40), col="purple")
```

```{r}
cor(tab)
```

```{r}
library(corrplot)
```

```{r}
corrplot(cor(tab), is.corr = TRUE, method = "ellipse", number.cex = .6, addCoef.col = "black")
```
